comments:
Eclipse 3.1.2 Build M20060118-1600 on Windows XP

When we first created our feature, we thoughtlessly set "nl=en" in feature.xml. Our feature has three "included features", one of which also has "nl=en" in its own feature.xml; the other two do not. We now have an update site for this feature which also has "nl=en" in the site.xml file.

We then created an "all-in-one" ZIP file containing an instance of Eclipse 3.1.2 with our feature pre-installed along with several other related and useful features for our users. 

When this all-in-one instance is expanded and used on a non-EN locale (we used Swedish in our testing), the Eclipse feature configuration is apparently corrupted.

Viewing "Help->Software Updates->Manage Configuration" in "normal" mode (Show Disabled Features is ->not selected), our main feature shows as disabled, the dependent feature which has "nl=en" is not displayed at all, while the two dependent features without an "nl" parameter display correctly. The dialog says that our feature can be enabled, but enabling the feature and re-starting Eclipse causes nothing to change in the configuration display.

Viewing "Help->Software Updates->Manage Configuration" with "Show Disabled Features" selected, our main feature does not display at all, nor does the dependent feature with "nl=en", while the two dependent features without "nl" show as top-level features.

When the system running in the non-EN locale is pointed at our update site  the update to our top-level feature is offered, and appears to download correctly, but during the install an error dialog stating "Unable to complete action for feature "com.unisys.ca.feature" due to errors? appears. The "Details" display for that error dialog contains this text:

Unable to complete action for feature "com.unisys.ca.feature" due to errors.

  Unable to complete action for feature "org.eclipse.cobol.feature" due to errors.

    Unable to create "c:\ft4\eclipse\features\org.eclipse.cobol.feature_3.1.1\feature.xml" on the file system. File already exists.

    Unable to create "c:\ft4\eclipse\features\org.eclipse.cobol.feature_3.1.1\feature.xml" on the file system. File already exists.

  Unable to complete action for feature "org.eclipse.cobol.feature" due to errors.

    Unable to create "c:\ft4\eclipse\features\org.eclipse.cobol.feature_3.1.1\feature.xml" on the file system. File already exists.

    Unable to create "c:\ft4\eclipse\features\org.eclipse.cobol.feature_3.1.1\feature.xml" on the file system. File already exists.


  Unable to create "c:\ft4\eclipse\features\org.eclipse.cobol.feature_3.1.1\feature.xml" on the file system. File already exists.


The .log file in <workspace>/.metadata contains
